snippet.title: InvaSEAve OFFICIAL TRAILER
snippet.description:
This game is a bit of a change of pace, as it is less about robots (although there is a robot present) and more about the ocean.  This game is also a totally 100% normal edutainment game about invasive species. 

DOWNLOAD ON ITCH.IO: https://sciaenops.itch.io/invaseave

ORIGINAL DESCRIPTION:
"The oceans have been invaded by a strange type of fish. These fish are rapidly reproducing, destroying all native forms in the area. We have deployed Tethys, a robotic drone to capture and study these fish. 

Where did they come from? Why are they decimating our oceans? 

How do we stop them? How do we prevent this from happening again?

    • An interactive fiction piece about the dangers of invasive species
    • Inspired by the real-life lionfish epidemic in the Gulf of Mexico
    • Study and protect the ocean
    • Avoid harming native species
    • Featuring photography from Unsplash.com, sound effects by Zapsplat.com, and music by Alexander Nakarada"
